MILLIPEDE model: predicting transcription factor binding sites using DNase digestion data.

Reference: 

* Luo K, Hartemink AJ. 2013. Using DNase digestion data to accurately identify transcription factor binding sites. Pac Symp Biocomput, 2013 pp. 80-91.
